title: All Ball - Tatum's Tear; Doug's #1 Seeds; Guest Danny Tarkanian On Tark's Legacy, Battles With The NCAA, Misconceptions
itunes:title: All Ball - Tatum's Tear; Doug's #1 Seeds; Guest Danny Tarkanian On Tark's Legacy, Battles With The NCAA, Misconceptions
description:
In this episode, Gottlieb thinks Jayson Tatum's superstar coming out season makes the Celtics the favorite heading into the Eastern Conference playoffs, and gives his current NCAA Tourney #1 seeds, Today's guest is attorney and author Danny Tarkanian, who discusses his recent book Rebel with a Cause, and his father, legendary UNLV coach Jerry Tarkanian, his battles with the NCAA, title team, Duke loss, and how he wants his father to be remembered. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
